1.0: Program now randomly chooses the color of the menu [Can be configured in the config].
Everything is now in alphabetical order.
Added a try catch onto each module so now it doesn't crash if you accidently don't input a number and press enter.
Changed messages of all colors to use a default color across the program.
Everything is explained in the 'Config Help.txt' file.
Generate random strings [Amount and length configurable].
Remove all passwords that doesn't contain at least 1 uppercase letter.
Remove all passwords that doesn't contain at least 1 number.
Remove all passwords that doesn't contain at least 1 symbol.
Remove all passwords that doesn't contain at least 1 uppercase and 1 symbol.
Remove all passwords that doesn't contain at least 1 number and 1 uppercase.
Remove all passwords that don't contain at least 1 number, 1 uppercase and is shorter than x amount of characters.
Remove all passwords shorter than x amount of characters.
Combine usernames.txt and passwords.txt (files configurable) into 1 text file.
Ability to randomize x amount times, randomize your list once or 100 times, it's up to you.
Randomly select a domain from a list and add it to a user:pass combo to make it email:pass.
1.1: Added data + time to file name to avoid overwriting.
Removed progress bar from file splitter.
1.3: Now displays a timer instead of nothing for 3 seconds.
Displays a warning if the file size is bigger than the amount of ram you have.
Fixed a bug in combo combiner mode 1.
Added an auto installer for modules you don't have installed.
Config file is no longer case sensitive
And probably some other shit I forgot to write down
